text: Approval for the somo-v:  automated breast ultrasound system (abus). this device is indicated as an adjunct to mammography for breast cancer screening in asymptomatic women for whom screeningmammography findings are normal or benign (bi-rads assessment category 1 or 2), with dense breast parenchyma (bi-rads composition/density 3 or 4) and have not had previous clinicalbreast intervention. the device is intended to increase breast cancer detection in the described patient population.
